The correct chronological order is:

A: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6

Explanation:
- The speaker begins by stating that Ionos and Nextcloud share the same vision of European data sovereignty (Event 1).
- Then, a slide appears reading “IONOS and 1&1 share the same vision” next to the speaker (Event 2).
- The world map slide with stats like “>25m Domains” and “>100K Servers” is shown (Event 3).
- The speaker mentions that they now offer Kubernetes as a managed service (Event 4).
- The blue poster “What we guarantee our customers” with five categories fills the screen (Event 5).
- Finally, he introduces an enterprise-grade Nextcloud on IONOS with unlimited storage and user seats (Event 6).

This sequence matches option A.
